content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) and inserter (position y1) that puts into stone furnace
- Stone furnace (position x2) and inserter (position y2) that puts into stone furnace

### Coal and Iron Ore Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) receiving iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x2) receiving iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x1) receiving coal
- Stone furnace (position x2) receiving coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory updates
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you are aware of the items you have, especially after harvesting or extraction activities.
